channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden and Trump will meet in the Oval Office on Wednesday, the White House says
item.description: But Trump, a Republican, did not host Biden, a Democrat, for a sit-down after the 2020 election, when Trump lost his reelection bid.

item.title: DNC official calls Harris campaign a '$1 billion disaster'

item.title: From Darwin to Wall Street: A Rebuttal
item.description: The problem within finance is its philosophical core; that is, the worldview upon which our analytical frameworks are based.

item.title: DEI Is a Corporate Bust
item.description: Corporations that bow to DEI pressure may soon find out they cannot afford it.

item.title: ‘A Real Mess’: Milwaukee Again Delivers An Election Night Debacle
item.description: 'They are reducing confidence in results,' Senator Ron Johnson said of Milwaukee Democrats' penchant for election administration issues.

item.title: The Welcome Demise of Ranked-Choice Voting
item.description: Tuesday should also be remembered as the day this complicated and unnecessary electoral method died (except in D.C.).

item.title: FBI, FCC, Justice Department investigating racist texts sent to people in multiple states
item.description: Federal officials are investigating a series of racist text messages sent to Black and Hispanic people in multiple states.

item.description: 'For Plaintiffs to suggest that the NYVRA is not a race-based (or national origin-based) statute is simply to deny the obvious,' the judge stated.

item.title: Escaping the Benchmark Trap: A Guide for Smarter Investing
item.description: Is it time to eschew the benchmark trap in favor of Warren Buffett's rule, "Don't lose capital?"

item.title: The Jihad against Jews Is a War against the West

item.title: Trump teases he'd bail out Harris campaign debts for sake of ‘unity’ in latest troll
item.description: President-elect Trump has teased the idea of bailing out the Harris campaign's debts for the sake of national "unity" in a social media troll.

item.title: A Pompeiian Cult, Caravaggio’s Seven Works of Mercy, and Bronzes Galore in Naples
item.description: Plus, a naughty satyr scores with a she-goat in the archaeology museum’s porn gallery.

item.title: President-elect Trump's 2024 popular vote count officially surpasses 2020 election numbers
item.description: President-elect Trump's popular vote numbers for 2024 have officially surpassed his 2020 total despite five states not finishing vote counts.

item.title: Arizona’s ‘Broken’ Election Administration Is A Habit Officials Refuse To Break
item.description: The status quo in Arizona 'has to stop, because the length of the process is undermining confidence in the system.'

item.title: Stop Crying On The Internet. It’s Embarrassing And Pathetic
item.description: The impulse for anyone to take out their cell phone and start recording themselves when sobbing is evidence of pure narcissism.

item.title: The Biden Error
item.description: The events of 2020 seemed epochal. Trump’s election exposed them as aberrant.

item.title: Pro-Trump college students party like it's 2016 as Gen Z trends to the right
item.description: Not all college students are turning to cookies and Legos to help them cope with Tuesday's election outcome. Some are celebrating.
